description:
Docker is one of the hottest topics amongst IT teams. Discover how the disruption of Docker helps to solve the many pain points encountered when using continuous delivery platforms. We will review how Docker helps to combine the flexibility desired by application teams with the governance and the infrastructure optimization required by the engineering shared services team.

Delivered by Cyrille Le Clerc
title: Jenkins World 2016 - Dockerizing Your Jenkins Platform? Why It's Important
